title: Braum Lionheart! ... hidden behind his own skins.
body:
Obviously not a game breaking issue but it would be nice if you added a reversed image so that we can see out knight in shining armor!

Edit: Gragas is also hidden behind his abilities on his character menu :P

Thanks :D

~Conquered 01

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is definitely not intended. We'll be resolving this! :]

Wonderful and great response time! 

Thank you for your help!
This also applies to Pentakill {{champion:83}} . Please don't forget him.
Yup! That's also a known issue!

Already saw the new splash in S@20's post! 

Very cool :D!
I will have to see it now then! I just got off work. XD
Ever so kind... gives his own splash to role-players in need.
At least you can still see his mustache, and that's all that matters.
You could search for the splash art online, but you're right i guess, flipping an image shouldn't be too hard. ^^

Of course :) and i appreciate the thought!

I usually see the variety of splash art orientations on S@20 for this very reason. It was probably just an oversight.
